Class GameEvent

java.lang.Object
uwi.comp3607.jeopardy.logging.GameEvent
public class GameEvent extends Object
Represents a single event in the Jeopardy gameplay session for process mining.

Each event corresponds to a user or system action, such as "Start Game", "Select Question", "Answer Question", or "Generate Report". Events are ultimately written to game_event_log.csv with columns matching the project handout.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEvent

      public GameEvent(String caseId, String playerName, String activity, Instant timestamp, String category, Integer questionValue, String answerGiven, String result, Integer scoreAfter)
      Creates a new game event with all fields specified.
      Parameters:
      caseId - identifier for the game session
      playerName - name of the player who triggered the event (or empty)
      activity - short description of the activity
      timestamp - time at which the event occurred
      category - question category, if applicable
      questionValue - question value, if applicable
      answerGiven - answer text, if any
      result - result of the action (e.g. "Correct", "Incorrect")
      scoreAfter - player's score after this event

  • Method Details

    • simple

      public static GameEvent simple(String caseId, Player player, String activity, Instant ts)
      Convenience factory method for a simple event without question details.
      Parameters:
      caseId - game session ID
      player - player associated with the event, or null for system events
      activity - activity description
      ts - event timestamp
      Returns:
      a new GameEvent with minimal fields populated

    • withQuestion

      public static GameEvent withQuestion(String caseId, Player player, String activity, Instant ts, String category, Integer value, String answer, String result, Integer scoreAfter)
      Convenience factory method for a question-related event.
      Parameters:
      caseId - game session ID
      player - player associated with the event
      activity - activity description
      ts - event timestamp
      category - question category
      value - question value
      answer - answer text
      result - result of the action
      scoreAfter - player's score after this event
      Returns:
      a new GameEvent with question details populated

    • getCaseId

      public String getCaseId()
      Returns:
      the game session identifier (Case_ID)

      public String getPlayerName()
      Returns:
      the player name associated with this event, or empty if none
